alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 3:50PM CST until January 27 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River at Macon. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Water surrounds sewage lagoon west of Macon; however, access road is not blocked. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 31.6 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - - && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Noxubee River Macon 28.0 9.2 Wed 3 pm CST 31.3 30.4 24.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued late tonight at 400 AM CST.
